attributes.action: ensure that all constituencies start the 2010 General Election count as soon as the polls close
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the 2010 General Election the counts for each constituency should be started as soon as the polls close. Counts should not wait until the next day, except in extreme cases.

Overnight counts will reduce the risk of electoral fraud and maintain participation.
